document.full_text: derek holland tossed a five-hitter for his second career shutout and the texas rangers beat the cleveland indians 4-0 on saturday night.
document.title: rangers' holland tosses five-hit shutout vs. indians
lines_and_colors: derek holland tossed a five-hitter for his second career shutout and the texas rangers beat the cleveland indians 4-0 on saturday night.
